cause.description:
Over 1 billion children live in poverty (1 in 2 children in the world). 640 million live without adequate shelter. 400 million have no access to safe water. 270 million have no access to health services. 10.6 million died in 2003 before they reached the age of 5 ( roughly 29,000 children per day ).
1. Poverty should not exist
2. Children deserve a future
cause.name: Confine Poverty
